text_block_list.text: T… that was amazing…! Ardan-san and the president's performance was so…!… Uh, huh? Did the song just change…?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume B

text_block_list.text: At the tail end of a glorious history—
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Common sense and conventions are born, and if they obstruct the road ahead—
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: We'll crush every wall in front of us here and now!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Hyaa?! C-C.B. and Ace-san?! Ah- they're starting to draw… a dragon—?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume B

text_block_list.text: Hah!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: (Don't look so shocked… I gotcha right where I wanted!)
(History and tradition, all that stiff stuff's fine and dandy, but… if all that doesn't ring a bell to ya, then take a good look!)
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Ei! Yah!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: (Aaah, I knew it. This is super fun…! Challenges, rebellion, a journey where I'm not held back by anything—)
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: (Yeah, yeah! All these words feel just right! We're the ones who'll go on how we want, and live the way we want!)
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Ace!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
We'll light a fire in your hearts in one go this New Year's! If you feel your strength start to overflow from within— go on and run it all out!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: It's okay— leave it to us to light the way ahead!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Wherever you want to go— you're free!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Hehe… ehehe… hehehehehe!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (Aaah, gosh! C.B.-chan and Ace-chan… Rudolf and Ardan-chan… you're all so wicked bodacious!)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (Which is why— ehe, I got selfish. ♪)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (Of course, performing together with Rudolf and Ardan-chan would've been totally tubular.)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
(But I also ended up wanting to do something only I could! 
So… I pulled out～ teehee. ♪)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Th-the song changed again! Shh… 
Wait, is it starting to snow? Is that… petals…?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I've witnessed many wishes. 
I've witnessed many resolves.
Even dreams that seemed as though they would disappear halfway through… and hearts that had lost their way.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
At times like that— remember. The very first day. 
The joy you felt taking that first step.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Remember that this place is your story.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Let us put our hands together and pray for each and every one of us. That we may follow our hearts— and run as far as we desire!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (… Just kidding. I'm playing the role of a goddess, but I've got another selfish wish in the back of my head.)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
(Because it's something I just thought of! 
… Hey, everyone. You know…)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (… I'm sick of traveling alone.)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (So, guys! You, you, and you— grit your teeth, bare your fangs, and come at me!))
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: (Won't you satisfy little ol' me?)
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Hehe… just kidding! ♪
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
… I feel like… they showed us something 
totally crazy this new year's…
Yeah… It was really awesome… and dazzling…! But, I just…!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume B

text_block_list.text: Yeah. I can't explain it…! But right now, I really, really—
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A

text_block_list.text: —want to run!!!
text_block_list.name: Both of them

text_block_list.text: Thus, this year's calligraphy performance raised both a tremendous excitement and lit a fire in everyone's hearts—
—Mejiro Ardan! Are you finished changing? I'd like to speak to you regarding the report I am to make at the student council's office…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: … Ah.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: …! So I take it— that you were watching the performance? Yes… Understood…!!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
… Yes. I took some personal liberties, 
but as your replacement—
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: No… As the leading role that you've entrusted to me, I've fulfilled my duty to the best of my ability.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: ! Eh… is that… truly alright? You made the preparations yourself, nee-sama? Ah- yes!… Understood.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: I will return home tomorrow with my head held high. I'm looking forward to our tea party together.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
